str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.
Behind, after; back, backwards. From the same as opisthen with enclitic of direction; to the back, i.e. Aback.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A reduplicated and contracted form of peto; probably akin to petomai through the idea of alighting; to fall.
Adverb perhaps from the base of chasma through the idea of a fissure in the soil; earthward, i.e. Prostrate.
